rapid-launch-bays-errata.author: Atomic Mass Games
rapid-launch-bays-errata.name: Rapid Launch Bays
rapid-launch-bays-errata.ability: Before deploying fleets, you may set aside a number of friendly squadrons up to your squadron value next to your ship card. When you reveal a command, you may discard this card. If you do, place each squadron set aside with this card within distance 1-2 of you. Those squadrons cannot move during your activation.
